english.segment1: What if the armies of the Lord. Picked up and dusted off their swords. Vowed to set the captives free. And not let satan have one more
english.segment2: What if the church, for heaven's sake. Finally stepped up to the plate. Took a stand upon God's promise. And stormed hell's rusty gates
english.segment3: Chorus: What if His people prayed. And those who bear His name. Would humbly seek His face Yeah. And Turn from their own way
english.segment4: And what would happen if we prayed. For those raised up to lead the way. Then maybe kids in school could pray. And unborn children see light of day
english.segment5: What if the life that we pursue. Came from a hunger for the truth. What if the family turned to Jesus. Stopped asking Oprah what to do
english.segment6: What if His people prayed. And those who bear His name. Would humbly seek His face Yeah. And Turn from their own way

english.segment8: If My people called by My name. If they'll humble themselves and pray. If My people called by My name. If they'll humble themselves and pray.
